title: Treating Skin of Color with Psoriasis
description: How does psoriasis affect skin of color and what are your treatment options?
cleaned_text: April 09, 2018 Recent Advance Articles For some psoriasis patients, getting the right diagnosis isn't always so black and white. And once minorities receive the proper diagnosis, they often face unique risks, challenges and stigmas. We use cookies to offer you a better experience and analyze our site traffic.
